snippet.title: Zorovan Powerplant Trailer
snippet.description:
VHS Found Footage Urbex Alien / UFO Stalker Horror. Zorovan Powerplant Out Now! Purchase: https://azagamestudio.itch.io/zorovan-powerplant
A urban explorer discovers a abandoned soviet era military owned powerplant deep within the woods and decides to explore the facility during a thunderstorm. The premise was rumored to be involved in government cover ups involving UFO activity and extraterrestrial activity before its imminent closure in the 1950s.

A VHS Found Footage Urbex Simulation horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design, focusing on the feeling of providing a realistic solo urban exploration in a abandoned military owned soviet era powerplant and the feeling of being stalked by aliens.

Features

    Realistic solo urban exploration simulation feeling
    Feeling of being stalked by aliens in a realistic environment
    Use your B/W camera mode to unveil secrets unseen to the naked eye.
    Sepia camera mode
    Limited blitz mechanic
    Photorealistic graphics and VHS Found Footage theme
    Realistic audio design
    No hand holding, non-linear exploration
    Multiple endings - 2 different possible endings 
    Randomized audio design system and event system 

ALL footage is ingame footage from a WIP build.

Created by Aza Game Studio.
More games: https://azagamestudio.itch.io/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzaGameStudio
